alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:06PM CST until February 01 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River at Edinburg. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 14.7 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 20.5 Tue 6 pm CST 19.4 18.2 17.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1000 AM CST.
